description: I realized that in computing terms, some deadlines are set in UTC. Ain't nobody got time to look that up all the time. It shows both the system default time and the UTC next to it.
Please add option to remove ':' and add Z on the end of the date, also 6 digit format option would be great like 161715Z where 16 is the day of month.

The bane of amateur astronomy is Daylight Savings Time. No problem remembering at 75 degrees west of Greenwich, each zone acquiring 15 degrees, and there are five of those in 75. So my UT offset is 5 hours. But THEN - Then they introduce DST. So I have to remember it's 4 hours not 5. It's nice you took the time to write your app. Thanks, works as it should. Job.Well.Done.
